segments.text: Those kids are so sneaky, climbing up to get cookies like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on that wobbly stool, and it looks like it's about to tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe he's reaching into the jar while balancing like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for her share, like it's the most normal thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their mother is completely oblivious, just drying dishes like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they do this often when she's not looking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable, and the floor is getting wet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get hurt, but they really shouldn't be doing this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to fall if he leans any further.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't watch this; it's making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR
